T

transcriptionElan() - Method in class Elpis
Get the ELAN (.eaf) version of the last transcript created by Elpis.transcriptionTranscribe(), which has a tier that includes an aligned annotation for each word token.
transcriptionNew(File) - Method in class Elpis
Upload an audio file to transcribe.
